spatial_accuracy.notes: Strong adherence to floor plan geometry. Most room adjacencies and wall alignments are correct. Key deductions: Kitchen island angle is slightly simplified compared to the multi-angled 2D design. Door orientations largely match but some door swings in the bathroom area are indistinct.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent structural fidelity. All rooms present, including the garage and porches. No illegal text or UI elements. The model correctly floats on a neutral background with a clear cutaway view. Minimal points deducted for simplified window frames in the Living Room.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture blocks are placed accurately according to room labels (beds in bedrooms, dining tables in 'Nook' and 'Dining Room'). Scale is consistent across the model.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect execution of the requested aesthetic. High-quality low-poly modeling, flat shading, soft ambient occlusions, and a correct orthographic isometric perspective.

detected_errors.description: The kitchen island/counter geometry is simplified, losing the exact multi-faceted angle shown in the 2D floor plan layout.
Windows in the Living Room and Master Bedroom are clustered slightly differently than the 2D architectural spacing.
